title: High Greens
description: Elevate your wellness with High Greens, a powerful blend designed to boost not just your body but your frequency. Packed with hemp, triple maca (red, black, and yellow), spirulina, beetroot, and moringa, this superfood mix provides holistic support for all body systems. Hemp delivers plant-based protein and omega-3s, maca enhances vitality and hormone balance, spirulina fuels energy, beetroot supports circulation, and moringa offers a nutrient-dense antioxidant boost. Perfect for smoothies, pre-workout, or as a nourishing breakfast alternative. Enjoy it mixed with apple juice and honey or apple juice and kiwi for a delicious, energizing start to your day.

title: ZEN MATCHA
description:
Energy Without the Crash

Ditch coffee. Get focus, energy & brainpower – without the jitters. This blend is crafted for sustained energy and mental clarity.

Boosts focus & mental clarity

Enhances memory & cognitive function

Long-lasting energy without the crash

Key Ingredients:

Matcha Green Tea – Provides clean energy and powerful antioxidants.

title: Daytime Eye Repair Tea
description:
Bright Vision & Energy Boost

Give your eyes the refresh they need – while boosting your energy naturally. This tea helps fight eye fatigue, supports vision clarity, and enhances focus for modern screen-heavy lifestyles.

Protects against digital eye strain & fatigue

Enhances circulation & hydration for clearer vision

Gently boosts energy without caffeine crashes

title: PERFORMANCE HERBAL BLEND
description:
Unlock Strength, Stamina & Vitality

This herbal blend is designed to enhance your body's natural power, energy, and endurance. Whether you're an athlete, a high performer, or looking for natural hormonal balance, this formula delivers:

Boosts physical & mental stamina
Supports healthy testosterone & hormone balance
Enhances circulation & blood flow
Increases endurance & recovery

Key Ingredients & Benefits:

Moringa – Rich in vitamins & minerals for all-around energy.
Ginkgo Biloba – Improves circulation, memory & mental clarity.
Horny Goat Weed – Natural support for stamina and hormone balance.

title: MAXIMUM PERFORMANCE & LONGEVITY BLEND
description:
Peak Performance, Recovery & Stress Resilience

A next-level herbal blend designed for those who want to optimize every part of their health—energy, recovery, brain function, and resilience.

Supercharges endurance, strength & energy
Supports muscle recovery & stress resilience
Enhances circulation & overall wellness
Balances hormones & improves focus

Key Ingredients & Benefits:

Damiana – Elevates mood & increases stamina.
